TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ow-ni-s-teLa-say-bu, title = Ow-ni-s-teLa-say-bu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ow-ni-s-teLa-say-bu} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Ow-ni-s-te.La-say-bu u saayaway a nan-cye ci Ni-al-sen a La-say-bu, Om,FRS " Ing a kamu Ernest Rutherford, 1st Baron Rutherford of Nelson, 1871 a mihca 8 a bulad 30 a demiad-1937 a mihca 10 a bulad 19 a demiad", Niw-si-lan u-li-sye-cye, i kitakit singanganay a yen-ce-he-u-lisye a wama. migingkiway tu sapasubana' u katinengan ciniza kilul Ba-la-ti zikuz u kahemekan nu mitanam a u-li-sye-cya. 歐內斯特· ,OM,FRS(英語:Ernest Rutherford, 1st Baron Rutherford of Nelson,1871年8月30日—1937年10月19日), . nilaculan La-say-bu saayaw patahkal tu bang-se-sin pan-suway-ci a nizateng, mipatatungus tu bang-se-syen malilid ku makay cacay a yen-su katukuh tu zumay a yen-su amasumad. bang-se-sin a tuud duduc patusul tu tineng pasasuma tu α se-sye atu B se-syen, asaca mipatatungus tu nuayawanay uyza u hay-li-ce. zayhan, sakay "yen-su a nikasumad atu bang-se-sye hwa-sye a nigikiwan", pakala ciniza tu 1908 a mihcaan tu Now-pey-al hwa-sye a kawlah. . La-say-bu mikilid tu masakaputay malaheci mipatatungus tu i yen-ce cung-sin izaw ku yen-ce-he, misabaluhay patizeng tu Say-bu-a kasahiza. saayaway malaheci ciniza tu i tan atu α li-ce a he pagilay pasasuma tu yen-ce, mapulung mitanam lalabu maazih tu ku ce-ce, asaca pangangan han tu ce-ce. saka 104 banggu yen-su a mikineng cinizaan tu nipangangan tu "Lu". "鑪". nikauzipan生平 1871 a mihca 8 a bulad 30 a demiad, ci La-say-bu lecuh i Niw-silan-ni-al-sen capiay a S-pu-lin-ke-low-bu "ayza nu tungus Pu-lay-te-ow-te", lumaay a calakakaan 12 ku tademaw, u ama niza mikawaw tu siking atu mipela' Ya-ma a kawaw, adidi' henay hina i luma'ay milutalutay a kusi atu miedap i Ya-ma kusi, namahiza pasubana' tu wawa u situngusay u ina. kowcung micudad ciniza i Hay-bu-low-ke, pahezik namicudad pabalucu' ciniza miala tu Ni-al-sen-sye-yen a kawlah, picudada tu nikauzipan niza u cayay kapawan a ninateng, i ayaw amapatay ciniza mahiza tu caay kapawan mitudawa tu acawa niza paini tu 100 pang pabeli tu Ni-al sen sye-yen, kilul 1890 a mihcaan micumud tciniza tu Kan-te-lye talakaway a cacudadan itiza malikeluh niza ku kasikazan a cyaw-su, , i pililidan nuheni ci La-say-bu tu sakay ke-sye a gingkiw sangaleb ku kaicelang, namikawaw tu tusa a mihcaan tu tyen-ce-sye nu saayway migingkiw. zikuz 1891 a mihcaan ciniza i "migingkiw tu tyen-ce" pakala tu sapaazih a kawlah.1895 a mihcaan, ci La-say-bu pakala tu kawlah a kalisiw, pitengil uyni a demiad i umah mikutkut tu ma-lin-su cinza, katinengan ci La-say-bu pakala tu seking sikawlah tu kalisiw, limaay a sakutkut bakah sa musakamu, "uyni u sazikuzay tu a nikutkutan aku a ma-lin-su". ". katukuh Ing-kow cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacudadan 31 sye-yen Ka-win-ti-si pitanengan migingkiw tu pow-se, salipahakay sa milayap tuyza nipasubana' ni Ye-se-bu.Tang-mu-sen. sawninay makay Niw-si-lan katukuh i Cyen-cyaw hawsa, sademiad sa micudad, makazih mahiza u "matinengay mikutkutay a pawalil". itiza ciniza pacena' mahiza tu maazih ku kitakit nu satanaya'ay a u-syen-ten-pow " tusa ing-li" a nikiluan, zikuz kilul maazih ku tin-ceay a Tang-mu-sen mala migingkiw. i pigingkiwan tu u-ce pibang-sean, mipabaluhay misanga' tu kisut a kamu, α "A-al-ba" atu β "pey-ta" a dil, u pikinsa maazih ku β a dil u dadawaay ku culil, icelang ku nikabesut nu ten-ce. . i 1898 a mihcaan ci La-say-bu mapaculcul mala Cya-na-ta-May-ci-al talakaway a cacudadan nu u-li- a cuzen, pitadengan maazih niza ku bang-se-sin a pan-suway-ci, bang-se-sin u-ce pangangan han α atu β bang-sen, uyni syang a pinaneng mapabeli i 1908 a mihcaan a Now-pey-al hwa-sye a kawlah, zayhan makinsa niza ku pihulak tu yen-su, hwa-sye atu bang-se-syen u-ce. 在1898年, . pawacay tu ciniza tu ba-ng-se-sen u yen-ce kahiza kalawacu masumad. nika caay kanamuh ciniza, zayhan saca u u-li-sye-cya kaku sa caay ku migingkiway tu hwa-sye. u singangan nu musakamuay niza, "ke-sye uyza dada' u-li sye-ke, cacay a sye-ke, zuma uyza u pisuped tu yu-pyaw a kawaw dada'". 1925 a mihcaan katukuh 1930 a mihcaan, ciniza mala hungti luma' sye-huy huy-cang atu zikuzanay nu midebungay sitinengay miedap tu li-se-huy cusi, miedap tu makayniay i Te-kow macapi tu 1000 ku tademaw nu talakaway midebungay nu sitenengay. 1925 a mihcaan ci La-say-bu pakala tu nu Ing-kow cen-hu a nipakawlahan tu kung-ci-sin-cang, 1931 a mihcaan pangangan han Ni-al-sen-a La-say-bu nan-cye. cacay ku tataynaan a wawa niza, ku-cye-wi i kapatayan niza caay tu kalalacan. i wawa henay hawsa, ci La-say-bu siimelang tu cayay kapihaceng a makabutulay, nika pakuniza han niza, caay pisakaph mingaay cinizaan, sazikuzay malahad makakulawit mapuut tu ku sawada', pihaceng satu ku imelang niza .1937 a mihcaan, anu mahicahica ku pisakalah micici', ci La-say-bu i Cyen-cyaw zikuz tu 4 a demiad mapatay tu ipadekuan u kamu nu misaydan "mabulsen ku sawda'" sa. u kudih niza i Ke-te-s-ke-lin a tatuduhan mituduh, zikuz u kasenengan tadem han i Si-mey-san, micapi tu Niw-tun atu zuma singanganay a Ing-kow ke-sye-cya.

== kakiliman == Ow-ni-s-te.La-say-bo o saayaway a nan-cye ci Ni-al-sen a La-say-bo, Om,FRS " Ing a kamo Ernest Rotherford, 1st Baron Rotherford of Nelson, 1871 a mihca 8 a bolad 30 a demiad-1937 a mihca 10 a bolad 19 a demiad", Niw-si-lan o-li-sye-cye, i kitakit singanganay a yen-ce-he-o-lisye a wama. migingkiway to sapasobana' o katinengan ciniza kilol Ba-la-ti zikoz o kahemekan no mitanam a o-li-sye-cya. 歐內斯特· ,OM,FRS(英語:Ernest Rotherford, 1st Baron Rotherford of Nelson,1871年8月30日—1937年10月19日), . nilacolan La-say-bo saayaw patahkal to bang-se-sin pan-soway-ci a nizateng, mipatatongos to bang-se-syen malilid ko makay cacay a yen-so katokoh to zomay a yen-so amasomad. bang-se-sin a tood dodoc patosol to tineng pasasoma to α se-sye ato B se-syen, asaca mipatatongos to noayawanay oyza o hay-li-ce. zayhan, sakay "yen-so a nikasomad ato bang-se-sye hwa-sye a nigikiwan", pakala ciniza to 1908 a mihcaan to Now-pey-al hwa-sye a kawlah. . La-say-bo mikilid to masakapotay malaheci mipatatongos to i yen-ce cong-sin izaw ko yen-ce-he, misabalohay patizeng to Say-bo-a kasahiza. saayaway malaheci ciniza to i tan ato α li-ce a he pagilay pasasoma to yen-ce, mapolong mitanam lalabo maazih to ko ce-ce, asaca pangangan han to ce-ce. saka 104 banggo yen-so a mikineng cinizaan to nipangangan to "Lo". "鑪". nikaozipan生平 1871 a mihca 8 a bolad 30 a demiad, ci La-say-bo lecoh i Niw-silan-ni-al-sen capiay a S-po-lin-ke-low-bo "ayza no tongos Po-lay-te-ow-te", lomaay a calakakaan 12 ko tademaw, o ama niza mikawaw to siking ato mipela' Ya-ma a kawaw, adidi' henay hina i loma'ay milotalotay a kosi ato miedap i Ya-ma kosi, namahiza pasobana' to wawa o sitongosay o ina. kowcong micodad ciniza i Hay-bo-low-ke, pahezik namicodad pabaloco' ciniza miala to Ni-al-sen-sye-yen a kawlah, picodada to nikaozipan niza o cayay kapawan a ninateng, i ayaw amapatay ciniza mahiza to caay kapawan mitodawa to acawa niza paini to 100 pang pabeli to Ni-al sen sye-yen, kilol 1890 a mihcaan micomod tciniza to Kan-te-lye talakaway a cacodadan itiza malikeloh niza ko kasikazan a cyaw-so, , i pililidan noheni ci La-say-bo to sakay ke-sye a gingkiw sangaleb ko kaicelang, namikawaw to tosa a mihcaan to tyen-ce-sye no saayway migingkiw. zikoz 1891 a mihcaan ciniza i "migingkiw to tyen-ce" pakala to sapaazih a kawlah.1895 a mihcaan, ci La-say-bo pakala to kawlah a kalisiw, pitengil oyni a demiad i omah mikotkot to ma-lin-so cinza, katinengan ci La-say-bo pakala to seking sikawlah to kalisiw, limaay a sakotkot bakah sa mosakamo, "oyni o sazikozay to a nikotkotan ako a ma-lin-so". ". katokoh Ing-kow cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacodadan 31 sye-yen Ka-win-ti-si pitanengan migingkiw to pow-se, salipahakay sa milayap toyza nipasobana' ni Ye-se-bo.Tang-mo-sen. sawninay makay Niw-si-lan katokoh i Cyen-cyaw hawsa, sademiad sa micodad, makazih mahiza o "matinengay mikotkotay a pawalil". itiza ciniza pacena' mahiza to maazih ko kitakit no satanaya'ay a o-syen-ten-pow " tosa ing-li" a nikiloan, zikoz kilol maazih ko tin-ceay a Tang-mo-sen mala migingkiw. i pigingkiwan to o-ce pibang-sean, mipabalohay misanga' to kisot a kamo, α "A-al-ba" ato β "pey-ta" a dil, o pikinsa maazih ko β a dil o dadawaay ko colil, icelang ko nikabesot no ten-ce. . i 1898 a mihcaan ci La-say-bo mapacolcol mala Cya-na-ta-May-ci-al talakaway a cacodadan no o-li- a cozen, pitadengan maazih niza ko bang-se-sin a pan-soway-ci, bang-se-sin o-ce pangangan han α ato β bang-sen, oyni syang a pinaneng mapabeli i 1908 a mihcaan a Now-pey-al hwa-sye a kawlah, zayhan makinsa niza ko piholak to yen-so, hwa-sye ato bang-se-syen o-ce. 在1898年, . pawacay to ciniza to ba-ng-se-sen o yen-ce kahiza kalawaco masomad. nika caay kanamoh ciniza, zayhan saca o o-li-sye-cya kako sa caay ko migingkiway to hwa-sye. o singangan no mosakamoay niza, "ke-sye oyza dada' o-li sye-ke, cacay a sye-ke, zoma oyza o pisoped to yo-pyaw a kawaw dada'". 1925 a mihcaan katokoh 1930 a mihcaan, ciniza mala hongti loma' sye-hoy hoy-cang ato zikozanay no midebongay sitinengay miedap to li-se-hoy cosi, miedap to makayniay i Te-kow macapi to 1000 ko tademaw no talakaway midebongay no sitenengay. 1925 a mihcaan ci La-say-bo pakala to no Ing-kow cen-ho a nipakawlahan to kong-ci-sin-cang, 1931 a mihcaan pangangan han Ni-al-sen-a La-say-bo nan-cye. cacay ko tataynaan a wawa niza, ko-cye-wi i kapatayan niza caay to kalalacan. i wawa henay hawsa, ci La-say-bo siimelang to cayay kapihaceng a makabotolay, nika pakoniza han niza, caay pisakaph mingaay cinizaan, sazikozay malahad makakolawit mapoot to ko sawada', pihaceng sato ko imelang niza .1937 a mihcaan, ano mahicahica ko pisakalah micici', ci La-say-bo i Cyen-cyaw zikoz to 4 a demiad mapatay to ipadekoan o kamo no misaydan "mabolsen ko sawda'" sa. o kodih niza i Ke-te-s-ke-lin a tatodohan mitodoh, zikoz o kasenengan tadem han i Si-mey-san, micapi to Niw-ton ato zoma singanganay a Ing-kow ke-sye-cya.
